name: (S)-3-Methyl-2-oxopentanoate:[dihydrolipoyllysine-residue (2-methylpropanoyl)transferase] lipoyllysine 2-oxidoreductase (decarboxylating, acceptor-2-methylpropanoylating)
comment: 3-methyl-2-oxobutanoate dehydrogenase complexes:3-methyl-2-oxobutanoate dehydrogenase a part of multi-step reaction (see R04225+R03174+R07618, possibly identical to R03171) subsequently R03174 TPP-dependent enzyme (see R07603+R07604)
